shortSlogan: We want our pupils to become informed, articulate and empowered citizens.
descriptionTitle: We want our pupils to become informed, articulate and empowered citizens.
description: Through our curriculum with its emphasis on the Environment and the Rights of the Child, our innovative pedagogy and the rich opportunities we provide, children develop the knowledge, skills and attitudes to thrive academically and personally. Affectionately known as 'Hattoneers,' our children embody high aspirations, mutual respect, and a commitment to making a positive impact. We are a happy, creative and inclusive school celebrating the rich diversity of our families. We are proud to be a beacon of excellence at the heart of our community.

shortSlogan: Nurturing Young Minds for a Bright Future.
descriptionTitle: Nurturing Young Minds for a Bright Future.
description: St. Mary's School offers a broad and balanced curriculum with a strong focus on personal development and academic excellence. We foster an inclusive and supportive environment where every child can achieve their best. Our dedicated staff and vibrant community work together to provide enriching experiences and a strong foundation for lifelong learning.
admissionProcess: Applications are accepted year-round with deadlines for specific academic years. We encourage visits and open days to learn more about our school community.

curriculum.curriculumAim: To provide a well-rounded education that supports academic success and personal growth. Our curriculum is designed to be engaging and challenging, preparing students for future education and life skills.

support.childSafetyAndHappiness: We prioritize the safety and well-being of all our students with dedicated safeguarding measures and a supportive environment.
support.bullingProtection: Our anti-bullying policy includes regular training and a clear reporting system to ensure a safe and respectful environment.
support.SENDPupilsSupport: We provide specialized support for students with SEND to ensure they achieve their full potential.
support.attendanceManagement: We monitor attendance closely and work with families to address any issues and promote regular school attendance.

achievement.academicChildSuccess: Our students consistently achieve high academic standards and develop strong personal and social skills.
achievement.wherePupilsGoAfter: Many of our students move on to local secondary schools and continue to excel in their education.

shortSlogan: Empowering Students to Achieve Their Best.
descriptionTitle: Empowering Students to Achieve Their Best.
description: London Academy provides a supportive and challenging environment where students are encouraged to excel academically and personally. We offer a range of extracurricular activities and support services to help students reach their full potential.
admissionProcess: Applications are processed through the local authority with specific deadlines for each academic year.

curriculum.curriculumAim: To deliver a rigorous and enriching education that prepares students for higher education and careers. We focus on academic excellence and personal development through a varied and challenging curriculum.

support.childSafetyAndHappiness: We ensure a safe learning environment with comprehensive safeguarding policies and regular staff training.
support.bullingProtection: Our school has a zero-tolerance policy towards bullying with established procedures for support and intervention.
support.SENDPupilsSupport: We provide tailored support for students with SEND to help them succeed academically and socially.
support.attendanceManagement: We work closely with parents to monitor and improve student attendance and address any issues.

achievement.academicChildSuccess: Our students excel academically and are well-prepared for further education and their future careers.
achievement.wherePupilsGoAfter: Our students transition successfully to colleges and vocational training programs, with many continuing to higher education.

description: Greenfield School provides an inspiring learning environment that emphasizes holistic development. Our curriculum integrates academic rigor with opportunities for creative and physical development, fostering well-rounded students who are prepared for future challenges.
admissionProcess: We offer admissions based on local authority guidelines with specific entry points throughout the year.

curriculum.curriculumAim: To deliver a balanced and engaging curriculum that supports the development of essential skills and knowledge, preparing students for lifelong learning.

support.childSafetyAndHappiness: Our commitment to child safety includes regular training for staff and a comprehensive safeguarding policy.
support.bullingProtection: We have a proactive approach to prevent bullying with education, support, and clear procedures for reporting.
support.SENDPupilsSupport: Specialist support and interventions are available to assist students with additional needs and ensure their successful learning experience.
support.attendanceManagement: We monitor attendance closely and provide support to families to promote regular school attendance.

achievement.academicChildSuccess: Students at Greenfield School achieve high standards and demonstrate strong personal and academic growth.
achievement.wherePupilsGoAfter: Our students move on to local secondary schools and continue their educational journey with confidence.

description: Riverbank School provides a dynamic and supportive learning environment where students are encouraged to explore their interests and achieve academic success. Our curriculum is designed to inspire curiosity and develop skills that will serve students throughout their lives.
admissionProcess: Applications are handled directly by the school with opportunities for open days and visits to learn more about our community.

curriculum.curriculumAim: To deliver an engaging curriculum that promotes academic excellence and personal growth, preparing students for future success.

support.childSafetyAndHappiness: We prioritize a safe and happy environment with regular training and clear safeguarding policies.
support.bullingProtection: Our anti-bullying approach includes comprehensive measures for prevention and support.
support.SENDPupilsSupport: We offer tailored support for students with SEND to ensure they have every opportunity to succeed.
support.attendanceManagement: We work proactively with families to address attendance issues and promote consistent school attendance.

achievement.academicChildSuccess: Our students demonstrate strong academic performance and develop essential life skills.
achievement.wherePupilsGoAfter: Our students move on to local secondary schools, equipped with the skills and knowledge for future success.
